Description: Fragment of a fibre mat(?) in plain weave with brocading; decorated with a panel containing a lozenge-shaped panel with dots; below, an incomplete Coptic inscription and pattern in light brown on dark brown.
Curator's comments: Cartwright, C. R. 2017. Identification of fibres and hairs from two textiles from Wadi Sarga EA 72632 and EA 72553. British Museum SR Analytical Request No. 2016/34, British Museum, London. [Unpublished].
